mission-strategy-generalization.instruction: Implement the Strategy Generalization refactor as defined in WO-136. Your goal is to eliminate 'config pollution' by replacing setattr injection in initializer.py with a proper ScenarioStrategy DTO and Dependency Injection. Ensure backward compatibility with existing scenario files.
mission-strategy-generalization.title: WO-136: Strategy Generalization

mission-perf-optimization.instruction: Scale the simulation to 2,000+ agents and generalize technology logic. Implement NumPy vectorization for bottlenecks and a probability-based tech diffusion engine.
mission-perf-optimization.title: WO-137: Performance & Vectorization

mission-sacred-hygiene.instruction: Harden the architecture (Purity Gate), resolve hardcoded Government IDs, and reorganize the test suite into unit/integration/scenarios categories.
mission-sacred-hygiene.title: WO-138: Sacred Hygiene
